dialogue.text: In a world surrounded by constant anomalies and dangers...
a mysterious and rebellious figure emerged.
After the disappearance of his family due to an entity in charge of corruption,
he vowed to build a world where everyone can feel safe.
He founded "The Greater Good", a task force highly specialized in the capture and annihilation of such anomalies.
One day he found Boyfriend in an alley with Daddy Dearest's daughter,
he took him inside the T.G.G. facility and decided to follow a different protocol from those used up to then.
He hypnotized him, looked into his memories and found...
